Jaws/The Oblitercons/Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot/Punch:




Jaws looked around for the source of the noise, but realized it was an 
incoming transmission.  He listened to the incoming transmission and nodded 
his head, liking what he heard.  He activated his comm. unit and opened a 
comm. link with Zardus.  

"Zardus, this is your loyal servant Jaws.  I've received a transmission from 
a gladiatorial league and I wish to enter, but it would require me to abandon 
my duties for it to end.  Is that alright?" he asked, already changing his 
course from his regular post in the ocean back towards the Iron Fist.

---

The Oblitercons had recovered from their wounds 100% and were headed for the 
bridge to talk with Zardus about a pay boost, when they all simultaneously 
received the IGL transmission.

"Five new robots, eh?" Dark One asked with a sly smile.

"We could double our numbers, obviously." Hiss pointed out.  "And no doubt 
with five additional troops to our numbers we could demand much, much more 
payment from the Alliance for our fine services."

"What are we waiting for?  Let's go!" Breakdown yelled. 

"The two week waiting period you dunder head!" Pyro yelled.  "Wait.  What do 
we do then?"

"We train, you dolts!  Let's get to the IF's holographic chambers and get to 
it!" Dark One yelled, all five of them walking briskly for the intended 
target.

---

Nemesis Enforcer was on the bridge with Punch when the main view screen 
displayed the image of IGL President Kaiser and began playing his 
transmission.

Nemesis Enforcer jumped backwards a good five feet and pointed at the screen 
with terror in his eyes and voice.  "Who the slag is that?!"

Punch shook his head at Nemesis' theatrical like performance.  "Listen to the 
message and find out...you idiot." the last two words being inaudible.

Nemesis went back to normal and took a seat.  "Good idea."

---

Scattershot looked around his room as Kaiser's transmission played.  "Is that 
you Primus?" he asked, but then realized it was a transmission from someone 
else.  

He waited until the transmission ended with a sadistic smile on his face.  
"Oh!  I'll need more armor!" he yelled out with a delighted squeal, taking 
Serpentor's battered head and ran towards the CR chambers to go get it fixed.
